attributes.additional_details: A friend of mine had a kitten who wasn't able to survive as all vets were closed today as well as the emergency phone.
attributes.background: To keep Vets open on bank holidays to prevent animal deaths. At least keep the emergency vets open.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

We are sorry to hear about your friend's kitten, but decisions about when to open are a matter for individual veterinarians, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to set up a publicly-funded healthcare service for pets, which could be open all the time, if that's something you'd like to happen.
